publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3348 Charlie Gordon: Castlemilk and Easterhouse, Beautiful Names but not Scummy Estates—That the Parliament notes that the journalist, Fraser Nelson, in comments on The Spectator magazine’s Coffee House blog on 30 January 2009, referred to Castlemilk and Easterhouse as "… beautiful names, scummy estates"; draws Mr Nelson’s attention to motion S3M-1561, which celebrated the award-winning Castlemilk Stables project, a regeneration project that produced a building awarded Scotland’s Best Building 2008 for best practice in conservation and sustainability through design excellence; also draws his attention to motion S3M-2184, which celebrated Castlemilk High School’s 2008 HM Inspectorate of Education report, which awarded the school six excellent ratings, the best ever achieved by a Glasgow school, and to motion S3M-3286, which highlighted the recent award of the Evening Times International Scotswomen of the Year title to Mary Miller, a former Castlemilk resident and founder of the outstanding Jeely Piece Club in Castlemilk; further notes the many outstanding regeneration projects in Easterhouse, and considers that Mr Nelson’s rudeness towards the communities of Castlemilk and Easterhouse is outstripped only by his ignorance of them. Supported by: Bill Kidd*, Kenneth Gibson*, Patrick Harvie*, James Kelly*, Bill Butler*, Willie Coffey*, Mary Mulligan*
S3M-3348 Castlemilk and Easterhouse, Beautiful Names but not Scummy Estates (lodged on 30 January 2009) Bob Doris*, David Whitton*, Robin Harper*
S3M-3348 Castlemilk and Easterhouse, Beautiful Names but not Scummy Estates (lodged on 30 January 2009) Alex Neil*, Ian McKee*
S3M-3348 Castlemilk and Easterhouse, Beautiful Names but not Scummy Estates (lodged on 30 January 2009) Gil Paterson*, Margaret Curran*
S3M-3348 Castlemilk and Easterhouse, Beautiful Names but not Scummy Estates (lodged on 30 January 2009) Karen Whitefield*
S3M-3348 Castlemilk and Easterhouse, Beautiful Names but not Scummy Estates (lodged on 30 January 2009) Mr Frank McAveety*
S3M-3348 Castlemilk and Easterhouse, Beautiful Names but not Scummy Estates (lodged on 30 January 2009) Cathy Peattie*
S3M-3348 Castlemilk and Easterhouse, Beautiful Names but not Scummy Estates (lodged on 30 January 2009) Marilyn Livingstone*
